sentences.en: 'A despatch sent after you from over yonder.
A cable inquiry would ensure early despatch, which is of benefit to you.
sentences.cn: 如来电询购,当可早日运交, 这对你方是有利的.

sentences.en: All orders, including your own, have already been made up and are now awaiting despatch.
sentences.cn: 所有的订货包括你方的订货都已制成待运.

sentences.en: Appropriate methods for authorising receipt from and despatch to such areas shall be stipulated.
sentences.cn: 管理进出储存货物之适当收发方法也应予以规定.

sentences.en: He feels we should act with despatch.
sentences.cn: 他觉得我们应该迅速行动。

sentences.en: He rushed the despatch through to headquarters.
It's highly expedient for you to use despatch, lest another should step in.
sentences.cn: 你最好是赶快, 否则别人会插进来.

sentences.en: Please book the necessary shipping space in advance to insure timely despatch of the goods ordered.
sentences.cn: 请预订所需的舱位以保证及时装运所订购的货物.

sentences.en: Please take note of our order, and kindly advise us when you can despatch the goods.
sentences.cn: 请对此次订购多加留意, 并请告知,何时能装运货物.

sentences.en: The Despatch and Transport Manager decides which method is the most suitable.
sentences.cn: 发货运输经理决定哪种方式最合适.

sentences.en: The despatch of the task force is purely a contingency measure.
sentences.cn: 派出特遣部队纯粹是应急之举。

sentences.en: The fox takes his chance with a pack of hounds which may catch him and despatch him immediately.
sentences.cn: 那只狐狸和一群随时可能置其于死地的猎狗冒险周旋。

sentences.en: To prepare parts and paperwork for the despatch of goods to sub - contractors and Customers.
sentences.cn: 为派遣给外委商和客户的物品准备零件和文件.

words.tran_cn: 调度员；调度程序；油品分输器；调度程序分配器

trans.tran_cn: 派遣，发送，急件，新闻报道，迅速
派遣，发送，处决，迅速处理
派遣， 调遣； 发送
